column2: Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Holy Roman Empire.
Reclaim Charlemagne's legacy as the protector of Rome and found the Saint-Empire Romain.
Restore the Byzantine Empire. The Roman Empire shall not be forgotten by history!

These are dark times. It is true, and I weep for the realm for its truth: the Empire has been broken. I can no longer foolishly claim the title. To do so would be comedy at best and sacrilege at worst...
Completely controls §Y[This.GetBaseName]§! and all of its holdings, aside from §YHagia Sophia§!\n
No other empire exists with a holder of a religion directly related to §Y[This.Religion.GetName]§!\n
